languages.text: "Отринь сожаления! Былое не должно омрачать будущее, в котором мы сообща прокладываем путь к свободе — пламенем и сталью!"

traits.locale_text: "Отринь сожаления! Былое не должно омрачать будущее, в котором мы сообща прокладываем путь к свободе — пламенем и сталью!"

languages.text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
languages.original_text: "Отринь сожаления! Былое не должно омрачать будущее, в котором мы сообща прокладываем путь к свободе — пламенем и сталью!"

traits.locale_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
"Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
"Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
"Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
"Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
"Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

languages.text: 「悔いを捨てなさい！過去に縛られてはいけない。炎と鋼をもって、未来の自由への道を我らが共に切り拓くのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: 「悔いを捨てなさい！過去に縛られてはいけない。炎と鋼をもって、未来の自由への道を我らが共に切り拓くのだ！」

languages.text: "Werft Eure Reue ab! Die Vergangenheit darf nicht die Zukunft überschatten, in der Ihr und ich gemeinsam unseren Pfad zur Freiheit schmieden ... mit Feuer und Stahl!"
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: "Werft Eure Reue ab! Die Vergangenheit darf nicht die Zukunft überschatten, in der Ihr und ich gemeinsam unseren Pfad zur Freiheit schmieden ... mit Feuer und Stahl!"

languages.text: « Abandonnez vos regrets ! Le passé ne doit pas éclipser l'avenir dans lequel nous tracerons ensemble notre voie vers la liberté par le feu et l'acier ! »
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: « Abandonnez vos regrets ! Le passé ne doit pas éclipser l'avenir dans lequel nous tracerons ensemble notre voie vers la liberté par le feu et l'acier ! »

languages.text: «¡Rechace sus remordimientos! El pasado no ha de oscurecer el futuro en el que usted y yo, juntos, forjaremos nuestro camino hacia la libertad... ¡a fuego y acero!».
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Rechace sus remordimientos! El pasado no ha de oscurecer el futuro en el que usted y yo, juntos, forjaremos nuestro camino hacia la libertad... ¡a fuego y acero!».

languages.text: “放下你心里的遗憾！过去无法遮蔽未来的方向！接下来我们将并肩作战，用烈火与钢铁锻造通往自由的道路！”
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: “放下你心里的遗憾！过去无法遮蔽未来的方向！接下来我们将并肩作战，用烈火与钢铁锻造通往自由的道路！”

languages.text: "Pişmanlıklarına teslim olma! Geçmişin geleceğine gölge olmasın. Özgürlüğümüzü ateş ve çelikle inşa edeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"

traits.locale_text: "Pişmanlıklarına teslim olma! Geçmişin geleceğine gölge olmasın. Özgürlüğümüzü ateş ve çelikle inşa edeceğiz!"

languages.original_text: "Cast aside your regrets! The past must not overshadow the future in which you and I, together, shall forge our path to freedom — with fire and steel!"
